bmi_20.title: Body mass index (BMI) at Age 20
bmi_20.description: BMI is considered out of range if any of the following occur: - Weight is less than 60 pounds - Height is less than 48 inches - Height is greater than 78 inches for females - Height is greater than 84 inches for males - After BMI is calculated, BMI is less than 15

enumDescriptions: Height Or Weight Not In Reasonable Range

bmi_20c.title: Body mass index (BMI) at Age 20
bmi_20c.description: This is the World Health Organization (WHO) standard categorization of BMI. BMI is considered out of range if any of the following occur: - Weight is less than 60 pounds - Height is less than 48 inches - Height is greater than 78 inches for females - Height is greater than 84 inches for males - After BMI is calculated, BMI is less than 15

height_f.title: Height (inches)
height_f.description: Question 23 - "How tall are you?" Height is considered out of range if any of the following occur: - Height is less than 48 inches - Height is greater than 78 inches for females - Height is greater than 84 inches for males - After Body mass index (BMI) is calculated, BMI is less than 15

weight20_f.title: Weight at Age 20 (lbs)
weight20_f.description: Question 22 - "What is or was your weight at these ages?" Weights less than 60 pounds are out of range.
